Setup¶

Requirements:

  • Python 3.7

  • pipenv (pip install pipenv)

Open jcc directory and install dependencies with pipenv:

pipenv install

For development dependencies (unit testing, etc…) (if required)

pipenv install --dev

Create pipenv virtual environment

pipenv shell

If you would like to use the verilog unit test functionality, Icarus-verilog must be installed (Linux only).

sudo apt-get install iverilog

Setup should now be complete. The program can be run as pipenv run python main.py, or this can be compiled to an executable with pipenv run pyinstaller –onefile jcc.spec (only works if dev libraries installed)
